basic_info.description: I am Irene Diaz, a software developer with experience in web and mobile application development. I love learning new technologies and working on challenging projects. I am always eager to learn and collaborate in a team.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most extensive application I had the opportunity to work on. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by an amazing curator. The application handles all adoption processes and allows for storing records on animals adopted from the shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for a study subject. I was responsible for testing a photography application that optimizes images using popular algorithms from graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I earned an A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I worked on during my internship. I had to develop the front-end for an app that shows 3D models of well-known buildings. This was also my first project using the Angular framework. I learned a lot!
